title: India Post Portal — Publish current draft UI to production

requirements.summary: Ensure the current draft UI (including smooth-zoom profile image preview overlay behavior) is the version that gets promoted to the live/production build.
acceptanceCriteria: The production/live URL serves the same UI/behavior as the latest draft build.
The profile image full-screen preview overlay uses the smooth zoom + fade animation on open and close, and still supports backdrop click, Escape key, and close button to dismiss.

file_operations.description: Harden and align the profile image full-screen preview overlay behavior to the intended production behavior: keep smooth zoom + fade on open/close, ensure Escape/backdrop/close button dismissal remains reliable, and prevent event bubbling/double-close (e.g., stopPropagation on the close button).

Verify the profile image preview overlay wiring still matches the latest draft behavior (open on image click; dismiss via backdrop/Escape/close button) and that no regressions are introduced by the overlay adjustments.

Add a short production promotion checklist to ensure the live deployment is built from the latest draft UI code (include steps aligned with the repo’s deployment tooling; use the github-export-icp-cli templates/scripts where applicable). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
